sqls.longname: 装配产品同步销售工厂相关sql

select.longname: 查询产品基础属性表
select.sql: select * from kup_dppb a join kup_dppb_sync c on a.prodcd = c.prodcd and a.corpno=c.corpno where c.SYNCST ='0' and c.corpno=#corpno#
select * from kup_dppb a join kup_dppb_sync c on a.prodcd = c.prodcd and a.corpno=c.corpno where c.SYNCST ='0' and c.corpno=#corpno#
select * from kup_dppb a join kup_dppb_sync c on a.prodcd = c.prodcd and a.corpno=c.corpno where c.SYNCST ='0' and c.corpno=#corpno#

select.longname: 查询产品开户控制表
select.sql: select * from kup_dppb_cust a join kup_dppb b on a.PRODCD = b.PRODCD and a.corpno=b.corpno join kup_dppb_sync c on a.prodcd = c.prodcd and a.corpno=c.corpno where c.SYNCST ='0' and c.corpno=#corpno#
select * from kup_dppb_cust a join kup_dppb b on a.PRODCD = b.PRODCD and a.corpno=b.corpno join kup_dppb_sync c on a.prodcd = c.prodcd and a.corpno=c.corpno where c.SYNCST ='0' and c.corpno=#corpno#
select * from kup_dppb_cust a join kup_dppb b on a.PRODCD = b.PRODCD and a.corpno=b.corpno join kup_dppb_sync c on a.prodcd = c.prodcd and a.corpno=c.corpno where c.SYNCST ='0' and c.corpno=#corpno#

select.longname: 查询产品机构控制表
select.sql: select *from kup_dppb_brch a join kup_dppb b on a.PRODCD = b.PRODCD join kup_dppb_sync c on a.prodcd = c.prodcd where c.SYNCST ='0'
select *from kup_dppb_brch a join kup_dppb b on a.PRODCD = b.PRODCD join kup_dppb_sync c on a.prodcd = c.prodcd where c.SYNCST ='0'
select *from kup_dppb_brch a join kup_dppb b on a.PRODCD = b.PRODCD join kup_dppb_sync c on a.prodcd = c.prodcd where c.SYNCST ='0'

select.longname: 查询产品存期控制表
select.sql: select a.PRODCD, concat('[', GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT depttm), ']') as depttm, GROUP_CONCAT(case when deptdy > 0 and depttm = '901' then deptdy end,',') as deptdy1, GROUP_CONCAT(case when deptdy > 0 and depttm = '902' then deptdy end,',') as deptdy2, GROUP_CONCAT(case when deptdy > 0 and depttm = '903' then deptdy end,',') as deptdy3, GROUP_CONCAT(case when deptdy > 0 and depttm = '904' then deptdy end,',') as deptdy4 from kup_dppb_term a join kup_dppb b on a.PRODCD = b.PRODCD and a.corpno=b.corpno join kup_dppb_sync c on a.prodcd = c.prodcd and a.corpno=c.corpno where c.syncst = '0' and b.corpno=#corpno# group by a.prodcd

select a.PRODCD, concat('[', listagg(depttm,',') WITHIN GROUP(order by depttm), ']') as depttm, listagg(case when deptdy > 0 and depttm = '901' then deptdy end,',') WITHIN GROUP(order by depttm) as deptdy1, listagg(case when deptdy > 0 and depttm = '902' then deptdy end,',') WITHIN GROUP(order by depttm) as deptdy2, listagg(case when deptdy > 0 and depttm = '903' then deptdy end,',') WITHIN GROUP(order by depttm) as deptdy3, listagg(case when deptdy > 0 and depttm = '904' then deptdy end,',') WITHIN GROUP(order by depttm) as deptdy4 from kup_dppb_term a join kup_dppb b on a.PRODCD = b.PRODCD join kup_dppb_sync c on a.prodcd = c.prodcd where c.syncst = '0' group by a.prodcd

select a.PRODCD, '[' || listagg(depttm) within group(order by a.prodcd) || ']' as depttm, listagg(case when deptdy > 0 and depttm = '901' then deptdy end,',') within group(order by a.prodcd) as deptdy1, listagg(case when deptdy > 0 and depttm = '902' then deptdy end,',') within group(order by a.prodcd) as deptdy2, listagg(case when deptdy > 0 and depttm = '903' then deptdy end,',') within group(order by a.prodcd) as deptdy3, listagg(case when deptdy > 0 and depttm = '904' then deptdy end,',') within group(order by a.prodcd) as deptdy4 from kup_dppb_term a join kup_dppb b on a.PRODCD = b.PRODCD and a.corpno=b.corpno join kup_dppb_sync c on a.prodcd = c.prodcd and a.corpno=c.corpno where c.syncst = '0' and b.corpno=#corpno# group by a.prodcd

select.longname: 查询产品存入控制表
select.sql: select * from kup_dppb_post a join kup_dppb b on a.PRODCD = b.PRODCD and a.corpno=b.corpno join kup_dppb_sync c on a.prodcd = c.prodcd and a.corpno=c.corpno where c.SYNCST ='0' and c.corpno=#corpno#
select * from kup_dppb_post a join kup_dppb b on a.PRODCD = b.PRODCD and a.corpno=b.corpno join kup_dppb_sync c on a.prodcd = c.prodcd and a.corpno=c.corpno where c.SYNCST ='0' and c.corpno=#corpno#

select * from kup_dppb_draw a join kup_dppb b on a.PRODCD = b.PRODCD and a.corpno=b.corpno join kup_dppb_sync c on a.prodcd = c.prodcd and a.corpno=c.corpno where c.SYNCST ='0' and c.corpno=#corpno#

select.sql: select * from kup_dppb_matu a join kup_dppb b on a.PRODCD = b.PRODCD and a.corpno=b.corpno join kup_dppb_sync c on a.prodcd = c.prodcd and a.corpno=c.corpno where c.SYNCST ='0' and c.corpno=#corpno#
select * from kup_dppb_matu a join kup_dppb b on a.PRODCD = b.PRODCD and a.corpno=b.corpno join kup_dppb_sync c on a.prodcd = c.prodcd and a.corpno=c.corpno where c.SYNCST ='0' and c.corpno=#corpno#

select.sql: select * from kup_dppb_dfir a join kup_dppb b on a.prodcd = b.prodcd and a.corpno=b.corpno join kup_dppb_sync c on a.prodcd = c.prodcd and a.corpno=c.corpno where c.SYNCST ='0' and c.corpno=#corpno#
select * from kup_dppb_dfir a join kup_dppb b on a.prodcd = b.prodcd and a.corpno=b.corpno join kup_dppb_sync c on a.prodcd = c.prodcd and a.corpno=c.corpno where c.SYNCST ='0' and c.corpno=#corpno#
select * from kup_dppb_dfir a join kup_dppb b on a.prodcd = b.prodcd and a.corpno=b.corpno join kup_dppb_sync c on a.prodcd = c.prodcd and a.corpno=c.corpno where c.SYNCST ='0' and c.corpno=#corpno#

select.sql: select * from kup_dppb_post_plan a join kup_dppb b on a.PRODCD = b.PRODCD and a.corpno=b.corpno join kup_dppb_sync c on a.prodcd = c.prodcd and a.corpno=c.corpno where c.SYNCST ='0' and c.corpno=#corpno#

select.sql: select * from kup_dppb_draw_plan a join kup_dppb b on a.PRODCD = b.PRODCD and a.corpno=b.corpno join kup_dppb_sync c on a.prodcd = c.prodcd and a.corpno=c.corpno where c.SYNCST ='0' and c.corpno=#corpno#

select.longname: 查询产品利息利率定义
select.sql: select * from kup_dppb_intr a join kup_dppb b on a.PRODCD = b.PRODCD and a.corpno=b.corpno join kup_dppb_sync c on a.prodcd = c.prodcd and a.corpno=c.corpno where c.SYNCST ='0' and c.corpno=#corpno#
select * from kup_dppb_intr a join kup_dppb b on a.PRODCD = b.PRODCD and a.corpno=b.corpno join kup_dppb_sync c on a.prodcd = c.prodcd and a.corpno=c.corpno where c.SYNCST ='0' and c.corpno=#corpno#

select.longname: 查询产品核算定义表
select.sql: select distinct a.prodcd,a.acctcd from kup_dppb_acct a inner join kup_dppb b on a.PRODCD = b.PRODCD and a.corpno=b.corpno join kup_dppb_sync c on a.prodcd = c.prodcd and a.corpno=c.corpno where c.SYNCST ='0' and c.corpno=#corpno#

select distinct a.prodcd,a.acctcd from kup_dppb_acct a inner join kup_dppb b on a.PRODCD = b.PRODCD and a.corpno=b.corpno join kup_dppb_sync c on a.prodcd = c.prodcd and a.corpno=c.corpno where c.SYNCST ='0' and c.corpno=#corpno#

select.sql: select * from kup_dppb_actp a join kup_dppb b on a.PRODCD = b.PRODCD and a.corpno=b.corpno join kup_dppb_sync c on a.prodcd = c.prodcd and a.corpno=c.corpno where c.SYNCST ='0' and c.corpno=#corpno#

select.longname: 查询产品附加属性
select.sql: select * from kup_dppb_addt a join kup_dppb b on a.PRODCD = b.PRODCD and a.corpno=b.corpno join kup_dppb_sync c on a.prodcd = c.prodcd and a.corpno=c.corpno where c.SYNCST ='0' and c.corpno=#corpno#
select * from kup_dppb_addt a join kup_dppb b on a.PRODCD = b.PRODCD and a.corpno=b.corpno join kup_dppb_sync c on a.prodcd = c.prodcd and a.corpno=c.corpno where c.SYNCST ='0' and c.corpno=#corpno#
select * from kup_dppb_addt a join kup_dppb b on a.PRODCD = b.PRODCD and a.corpno=b.corpno join kup_dppb_sync c on a.prodcd = c.prodcd and a.corpno=c.corpno where c.SYNCST ='0' and c.corpno=#corpno#

select.longname: 查询电子账户订单总数
select.sql: select count(*) from ( select a.traype,a.prodcd,a.cordno,a.transq,a.cardno,a.sbtram from knb_regi a where chckdt=#trandt# and corpno=#corpno# and a.cordno not in (select f.cordno from fnb_decd f ) union all select '4' traype, b.prodcd,b.ordrid cordno,b.transq,b.cardno,b.sbtram from lnb_ordr b where chckdt=#trandt# and corpno=#corpno# union all select '5' traype,c.prodcd,c.ordrid cordno ,c.transq,c.cardno,c.tranam sbtram from Fnb_Detl c where chckdt=#trandt# and corpno=#corpno# union all select '6' traype,d.prodcd,d.ordrid cordno,d.undosq transq ,d.cardno,d.tranam sbtram from fnb_undo d where chckdt=#trandt# and corpno=#corpno# ) e,kna_acdc e1,Kna_Cuad e2 where e.cardno=e1.cardno and e1.custac=e2.custac

select count(*) from ( select a.traype,a.prodcd,a.cordno,a.transq,a.cardno,a.sbtram from knb_regi a where chckdt=#trandt# and corpno=#corpno# and a.cordno not in (select f.cordno from fnb_decd f ) union all select '4' traype, b.prodcd,b.ordrid cordno,b.transq,b.cardno,b.sbtram from lnb_ordr b where chckdt=#trandt# and corpno=#corpno# union all select '5' traype,c.prodcd,c.ordrid cordno ,c.transq,c.cardno,c.tranam sbtram from Fnb_Detl c where chckdt=#trandt# and corpno=#corpno# union all select '6' traype,d.prodcd,d.ordrid cordno,d.undosq transq ,d.cardno,d.tranam sbtram from fnb_undo d where chckdt=#trandt# and corpno=#corpno# ) e,kna_acdc e1,Kna_Cuad e2 where e.cardno=e1.cardno and e1.custac=e2.custac

select count(*) from ( select a.traype,a.prodcd,a.cordno,a.transq,a.cardno,a.sbtram from knb_regi a where chckdt=#trandt# and corpno=#corpno# and a.cordno not in (select f.cordno from fnb_decd f ) union all select '4' traype, b.prodcd,b.ordrid cordno,b.transq,b.cardno,b.sbtram from lnb_ordr b where chckdt=#trandt# and corpno=#corpno# union all select '5' traype,c.prodcd,c.ordrid cordno ,c.transq,c.cardno,c.tranam sbtram from Fnb_Detl c where chckdt=#trandt# and corpno=#corpno# union all select '6' traype,d.prodcd,d.ordrid cordno,d.undosq transq ,d.cardno,d.tranam sbtram from fnb_undo d where chckdt=#trandt# and corpno=#corpno# ) e,kna_acdc e1,Kna_Cuad e2 where e.cardno=e1.cardno and e1.custac=e2.custac

select.longname: 查询电子账户订单
select.sql: select e.traype,e.prodcd,e.cordno,e.transq,e.sbtram,e2.custid cardno from ( select a.traype,a.prodcd,a.cordno,a.transq,a.cardno,a.sbtram from knb_regi a where a.chckdt=#trandt# and a.corpno=#corpno# and a.cordno not in (select f.cordno from fnb_decd f ) union all select '4' traype, b.prodcd,b.ordrid cordno,b.transq,b.cardno,b.sbtram from lnb_ordr b where chckdt=#trandt# and corpno=#corpno# union all select '5' traype,c.prodcd,c.ordrid cordno ,c.transq,c.cardno,c.tranam sbtram from Fnb_Detl c where chckdt=#trandt# and corpno=#corpno# union all select '6' traype,d.prodcd,d.ordrid cordno,d.undosq transq ,d.cardno,d.tranam sbtram from fnb_undo d where chckdt=#trandt# and corpno=#corpno# ) e,kna_acdc e1,Kna_Cuad e2 where e.cardno=e1.cardno and e1.custac=e2.custac

select e.traype,e.prodcd,e.cordno,e.transq,e.sbtram,e2.custid cardno from ( select a.traype,a.prodcd,a.cordno,a.transq,a.cardno,a.sbtram from knb_regi a where a.chckdt=#trandt# and a.corpno=#corpno# and a.cordno not in (select f.cordno from fnb_decd f ) union all select '4' traype, b.prodcd,b.ordrid cordno,b.transq,b.cardno,b.sbtram from lnb_ordr b where chckdt=#trandt# and corpno=#corpno# union all select '5' traype,c.prodcd,c.ordrid cordno ,c.transq,c.cardno,c.tranam sbtram from Fnb_Detl c where chckdt=#trandt# and corpno=#corpno# union all select '6' traype,d.prodcd,d.ordrid cordno,d.undosq transq ,d.cardno,d.tranam sbtram from fnb_undo d where chckdt=#trandt# and corpno=#corpno# ) e,kna_acdc e1,Kna_Cuad e2 where e.cardno=e1.cardno and e1.custac=e2.custac

select e.traype,e.prodcd,e.cordno,e.transq,e.sbtram,e2.custid cardno from ( select a.traype,a.prodcd,a.cordno,a.transq,a.cardno,a.sbtram from knb_regi a where a.chckdt=#trandt# and a.corpno=#corpno# and a.cordno not in (select f.cordno from fnb_decd f ) union all select '4' traype, b.prodcd,b.ordrid cordno,b.transq,b.cardno,b.sbtram from lnb_ordr b where chckdt=#trandt# and corpno=#corpno# union all select '5' traype,c.prodcd,c.ordrid cordno ,c.transq,c.cardno,c.tranam sbtram from Fnb_Detl c where chckdt=#trandt# and corpno=#corpno# union all select '6' traype,d.prodcd,d.ordrid cordno,d.undosq transq ,d.cardno,d.tranam sbtram from fnb_undo d where chckdt=#trandt# and corpno=#corpno# ) e,kna_acdc e1,Kna_Cuad e2 where e.cardno=e1.cardno and e1.custac=e2.custac

select.sql: select count(1) from kup_dppb_post a join kup_dppb b on a.PRODCD = b.PRODCD and a.corpno=b.corpno join kup_dppb_sync c on a.prodcd = c.prodcd and a.corpno=c.corpno where c.SYNCST ='0' and c.corpno=#corpno#
